about.title: About Me
about.bio: Hi! My name is Robert Rizzo and I'm currently studying to become a Java Developer at IT-H√∂gskolan. I'm passionate about software development and love solving problems with code. Outside of my studies, I volunteer as a youth leader and board member at a fishing club, where I also built their website.
about.lookingFor: I'm looking for opportunities as a Java Developer or Software Developer. Open to internships, junior roles, and collaborations ‚Äì don't hesitate to reach out!

items.title: Fishing Club Website
items.description: Built a complete website for the fishing club where I volunteer, serve on the board, and lead the youth group. The site presents the club's activities, events, and member information.

items.title: J√§rnvilja
items.description: Fullstack school project ‚Äì a martial arts-themed web application demonstrating my end-to-end development skills. Includes both frontend and backend with database management.

items.title: Weather App
items.description: School project consuming a REST API to display weather data and forecasts. Demonstrates understanding of API integration and asynchronous data handling.

items.title: Python Project
items.description: Hobby project built with Python. Details and description coming soon.

items.title: AI Chatbot
items.description: Hobby project ‚Äì an AI-powered chatbot. Exploring how machine learning and language models can be used to create interactive conversational experiences.

contact.title: Contact
